text: Does anyone know of an extensive CSS boilerplate outside of the one HubSpot has online that has any extra goodies to make things more efficient?
Sooner it later <#CCQSQ2C6L|crankshaft> will have all that and more
I know they'd love to have new contributors - Maybe you can get involved in <#CCQSQ2C6L|crankshaft>, the open source HubSpot CSS framework and help build that up <@UFRLX48M6> :slightly_smiling_face:
